doc:
Barbara New https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbara_New 0 Barbara Helene New (9 May 1923 – 24 May 2010) was an English character actress, well known for playing Mabel the scullery maid in the David Croft sitcom You Rang M'Lord?. Following this role, she appeared as Vera Plumtree in all twenty episodes of the BBC's final David Croft sitcom Oh, Doctor Beeching!. She had previously played smaller parts in Croft's earlier sitcoms Dad's Army and Hi-de-Hi!. New had a lengthy career in British television and played many other roles including appearances in Z-Cars, Emu's Broadcasting Company, Ripping Yarns and the silent Ronnie Barker comedy By the Sea. One of her last screen appearances was as Ali G's Nan in the 2002 film Ali G Indahouse. New also appeared in television adverts for Vicks over a twenty year period, initially as a mother and later as a grandmother. She was married to the actor Michael Barrington until his death in 1988. Barbara_Helene_New ( 9_May_1923 – 24_May_2010 ) was an_English_character_actress , well_known for playing Mabel the_scullery_maid in the_David_Croft_sitcom You Rang M'Lord ? . Following this_role , she appeared as Vera_Plumtree in all_twenty_episodes of the_BBC 's_final_David_Croft_sitcom_Oh , Doctor_Beeching ! . She had_previously_played smaller_parts in Croft 's_earlier_sitcoms_Dad 's_Army_and_Hi-de-Hi ! . New had a_lengthy_career in British_television and played many_other_roles including appearances in Z-Cars , Emu 's_Broadcasting_Company , Ripping_Yarns and the_silent_Ronnie_Barker_comedy By the_Sea . One of her_last_screen_appearances was as Ali_G 's_Nan in the_2002_film_Ali_G_Indahouse . New also appeared in television_adverts for Vicks over a_twenty_year_period , initially as a_mother and later_as a_grandmother . She was_married to the_actor_Michael_Barrington until his_death in 1988 .
